tweets.text: I know you hate humanity but it’s not fair that you made us crying our eyes out with AfterLife fucking brilliant mate!

So agree. Another thing I just mentioned to David. The beloved dog. the empty cupboard. The sense of futility mixed with the reality of responsibility. The scene where the sex worker cleans his house and comments, I like your dog... humanity , pain and paradox. So good!!!
Who knew could make something so beautiful & sad & full of moments of aching gut wrenching humanity ? Afterlife
Just binged afterlife it was amazing, critics complaining you are being you?? I am like but I love you being you lol I need more I am watching Humanity now I need a new stand up!
love Humanity and love your new show. Legend!
Having a evening. After Life, Derek and Humanity bestsunday

AfterLife This fucking show. Has me in tears. You cunt. Thanks for just exposing all of our fucking humanity . "All we have is each other" is my fucking theology. Bless Penelope Wilton. She's a goddamn angel.

Afterlife is a thing of beauty. The script, acting and humanity of the series is something to behold. Laughter and tears in equal amounts. Not been as moved by a series since Boys From the Blackstuff Genius
“Just want to be popular. Love my new incredibly well written, reflection of humanity ” - pathetic.
After life by is a absolute master class in writing, acting & humanity . Well done to him & all involved especially the dog.
Humanity by Ricky Gervais ? Not sure if you’re a fan f his or not
Just Finished AfterLife . Your work amazes me. A unique blend of irreverent comedy and humanity . It touches my soul (and splits my gut). Thank You. Now I need stitches.
First off, watch humanity , he is still by far the funniest out there. Second, yes watch it, it is truly amazing
I find it ironic, tragic, apropos, beautiful, revolutionary, and absolutely-fucking-fascinating that it takes an Atheist to give me|us any real faith* in Humanity . AfterLife
Gotta say just bites, chews and spites you with every show he performs. Humanity is a bomb in the head I wish a could forget... so I can watch it again and again.

“You can laugh at bad things without being a bad person.” - I don’t know if it is because I am a former atheist and I relate to how he thinks or it’s just because I have an equal disdain for humanity , but I love his comedy!

I’ve seen it now. It was incredible. My favourite line is HopeIsEverything . The last episode was my favourite, I think for obvious reasons, without giving away spoilers. I really loved it. I’ve only watched two things on Netflix now. This & Humanity . I’ve had it since December.

Taking my pretty time in watching the new series AfterLife . Starting with Episode One here... All of his shows manage to cut to the core of humanity , and off the bat this one immediately confronts death, grief, love, loss, and acclimation. So ready to see more.

I finished binge-watching After Life the other night then watched Humanity last night. Both were brilliant, moving and funny. They also helped me get over being offended by the c-word which used to make me cringe. Thank you for being you, Ricky.

afterlife well done laugh out loud moments, combined with thought-provoking concepts, love, hope, misery, a crocodile Dundee-style tin of dog food to the face and an observation of the simplicity of humanity ’s needs.

Hell, ’ ‘The Afterlife’ literally had me on a rollercoaster of emotions. One minute I was laughing my tits off, the next minute I was wiping my snotty nose on my wife’s dressing gown-I’m classy like that. A beautiful series, with so much authenticity and humanity .
Humanity (Netflix) (2019) (5/5) Funny and true! Humanity
Humanity on is so funny. Much watch. I am one of Ricky’s 12 million followers
I enjoyed “After Life”. It rather mirrored “ humanity ”. .. it’s hard to find happiness sometimes but it’s there. Thanks for the laughs it’s been a long time.

i can't question this wasn't excellent. I felt a massive mix of emotions during the journey but felt happy at the end. I'll be honest, not a big fan of the office or extras, liked humanity and your animal views. Well done! AfterLife
Amazing show watched humanity last night too and is so funny starting extras tonight
Exactly like me. Thought it would be too dark for my tastes but the sheer humanity won me right over. And the dog obviously
watching your show HUMANITY today-cheered me up.
It's incredible. I loved it. U write people in such an amazing way & capture humanity so well. Its funny poignant & thought provoking

I love the office, extras, derrick, and Ricky's earlier stand-up, and I understand the idea of not constantly walking on eggshells when we talk, but some of his rhetoric toward transgender individuals in Humanity crossed a line. Its not about bad words, its about tone-deafness.
Watched Humanity 3 times and After Life twice now. It’s fair to say Ricky Gervais is a genius

Watched it twice, was moved both times. My wife died in 2016. As much as I sometimes wanted to, I did not walk around acting like a cunt to people afterward. I guess I just don't have Ricky's quick wit, or his firm grasp on the nature of humanity , or his gassy, bloviated torso.
AfterLife humanity now watching politics . Can’t get enough of this week!!
Humanity is a plague —
Afterlife is great but I love Humanity much more

Just re watched your Humanity show ,is the post man in afterlife who reads Tony’s mail inspired from the story of your brother sending a postcard to your mother about the post man reading her mail? AfterLife Humanity
About to start that one. So many good lines RE humanity , being a good person etc. My heart hurts

afterlife is an absolute masterpiece. As someone who suffers from mental illness,the program creates laughs , serious insight and humanity to an illness very much misunderstood . When he loses it in pub with noise of guy eating crisps , wow that was me !! Must watch
I’m a copper in Dublin 15 years and hated humanity for a while ‘after life’ just made me laugh and cry. Just amazing from start to finish

His stand up can be unnecessarily cruel (it's possible to make jokes about a subject without targeting vulnerable people), but his work in TV comedy/ drama is funny, warm, heart breaking and full of humanity (it's also wonderfully offensive in a way that gets it's targets right).

Afterlife is the best tv you’ve done. Your humanity shines through it. The vaginal yeast scene had me crying. The scenes in the home remind me so much of moments with my Dad. And as with all your work, it’s the delicate touches. Thanks for making it a better world.
"After Life" is lessons in humanity wrapped in dark comedy. Thank you
An unbelievable series - all humanity is there... wonderfully portrayed by the whole cast. Thank you!

new series AfterLife is as beautiful as it is understanding of & sympathetic to the array of wacky things people do to survive and find hope and connection whilst being part of the parasite fest that is humanity :-) absolutely incredible work. thanks RickyGervais

Great show. It was real on so many levels. Depression, addiction and thoughts of suicide can affect anyone. To hurt and suffer is to be human. If you can find the good and share it with others, well, that is humanity . Cheers.

No one puts more heart and humanity into his work than . His new show After Life (on Netflix) is hilarious, heart wrenching and beautiful all at the same time. Highly recommended, just like everything he has ever done. AfterLife Netflix ChubbyFunster
Is there any chance you make an European Tour of one of your solos? I would love to see you live in Portugal. I loved Humanity so much
After Life is amazing Love him or hate him, Ricky Gervais knows how to connect with peoples humanity

If you fancy watching a series that can only be described as the ‘ultimate’ episode of The office/Extras/Derek/ Humanity all rolled into one then afterlife is the badger. you’ve only gone and nailed it again. Bravo.
once again you are able to make me laugh and cry in a moment. Absolutely loved after life and the amazing casting! Followed by humanity in a wonderful day of Gervaisiness!!!!!
Derek gives you the same feeling Afterlife does. Focuses on humanity and kindness but hilarious to. u will love it
I binged-watched it all in one go Janet. It’s brilliant. Then I watched Humanity . Now I’m watching Derek (just amazing). I can’t get enough ... help me!
Just watched Humanity on Netflix!! Very funny! Never seen his stand up properly so I shall be watching the lot soon!!!
Exactly 1 year ago : Humanity premiered on . And it is still a pleasure to watch. Cannot wait to see the transformation from comedian to actor in After Life. HYPE
People who hate the C word would hear it a lot less if they stopped being such cunts humanity netflix hilarious

First of all - afterlife is brilliant, full of humanity . Second, thanks for getting dementia and losing someone so right. Thirdly, thanks for showcasing amazing dogs and their healing powers. Here’s my GSD who has been a miracle worker for my heart
Congrats to for creating these masterpieces ! Such a rollercoaster of emotions ! Thank you, from a French fan :D Humanity AfterLife
should have left it humanity

Afterlife is one of the most beautiful, moving and powerful things I’ve seen. is a genius and this is a treasure. His cultural and social commentary and analysis are second to none, he wonderfully and clinically pulls humanity ’s pants down every thirty secs.
I thought the humanity special was some of his best work but AfterLife is a game changer. The scene with the breast milk nearly killed me

Just watched Humanity by on . You're a genius, simply brilliant and fuckin smart. "That's what I mean. We're all gonna die, so we should have a laugh, because of you can laugh in the face of adversity, you're bulletproof."
Ricky Genius, with a deep love for animals n humanity
No one does the brutal and beautiful nuance of humanity like Ricky Gervais .
Started watch Afterlife tonight on with ... love the brutality of it, 4 episodes in and you better get happy sucker before we do realise humanity are parisites and earth is better off without us!!

watched Humanity then After life both bloody awesome. Giggled my arse off and then got something in my eye. If I watch nothing else on Netflix all year these two would be worth the fee alone. Bravo to all concerned
Spent this afternoon watching Afterlife and now about to watch Humanity . Its been an day and ive loved every minute!
just proves once again how amazingly talented he is. How he can go from Humanity to AfterLife Right after I finish it I continued with Derek

The year: 2027. Due to economic collapse and climate decimation, the world has become a desolate landscape. But, a man rises above a broken city. A glimmer of hope for humanity . pulls down his scarf. “IS ANYONE OFFENDED BY ME?!?

Just finished watching 's AfterLife , brilliant piece of work, couldn't recommend it any more, beautiful depiction of humanity , plenty of laughter, a little tragedy and something to think on, shaken, not stirred. Check it out on Netflix.
Humanity ! Extras had its moments (Ross Kemp) After Life is the neatest he has got to The Office, a bit darker tho but at same time a bit cheesy too
watched afterlife and humanity today, thanks for making my wife and my life that little bit better. Keep up the good work x
This man saved his These are the people whose action restore the faith in humanity a little bit. joseguzman
Haha!! You’re too kind Dyane!! That bit on Humanity cracked me up. Did you love it?!!

Seriously the best thing I've seen in ages- I've been glued to the series all weekend. A stellar cast led by the fantastic . Let nobody doubt what an exceptionally talented writer and actor he is, with humanity and pathos running through every scene. Simply perfect!

Afterlife it’s genius hats off to him again. Best quote so far “ humanity is a parasite. We should all kill ourselves, and land on someone from accounting”. Very thought provoking actually. mentalhealth
Ricky Gervais : Humanity : 7/10
does it again! Absolute genius man, caputuring humanity and humour at the same time. AfterLife
I kinda have developed a crush on - never saw the but I can’t stop rewatching humanity and afterlife . You are absolutely profound and brilliant and amazing! Pudgy cute unite!
Humanity is not a plague. We are equipped to handle the worst of the worst, but Need Jesus to have Control.
Well has done it again. How he makes laugh out loud comedy that teaches so articulately the condition of humanity astonishes me. Well done. AfterLife
Check out " Ricky Gervais : Humanity " on Netflix comedy

Ricky, you did an absolutely great work of art with this - it was honest and moving - it touched people - and that’s what the best art always is. You have a gift of being able to tell stories of humanity , and you do it beautifully .
If you haven’t seen AfterLife yet - get watching. Love take on anything humanity and life related. Also loves dogs and he created The Office - legend
Have you watched Humanity ?
Derek? Humanity ? If u ain't into that I wouldn't bother go watch corrie or summert
Watching AfterLife on Netflix. Makes me cry more than "Derek". knows humanity and human emotion so well. He can reduce me to mush with the simplest exchange on screen. Dick.

I wonder how many people watch After Life by and then complain about it. It's fucking hilarious. must soil themselves with excitement every time he releases something. I joined before just to watch Humanity then left, now joined again for this.
Big fan, rewatched humanity last night... That joke about dogs and their jobs
AfterLife what a rollercoaster of emotions. Loved every moment of it! Such a powerful observation of humanity . Thanks

Afterlife is hilarious, poignant, dark and slightly offensive in the best way. Everything I’ve come to love about and the damn Britts. And if you really want to be offended while laughing and muttering “yes that’s really bad” check out his show Humanity
I got a like off him last week haha, he is brilliant tho. Humanity where he says Caitlin Jenner didn't do much for women drivers nearly broke me ribs.

Binge watched all of 'After Life' last night. I'm sure many can relate to the screwy way grief messes with us, hardening hearts against more hurt. And, how animals can keep us going when we just wanna tell humanity to F-off. Bravo for such an honest production
If you want just laugh watch humanity otherwise others are good but not for laugh

That should be available on prescription. afterlife will do more for mental health than any quack. From the depths of despair you can find hope,love and humanity . Truly remarkable writing and performances from you all. You may well have saved this sole. Thank you.
Both have their own merits! I’ve seen Humanity 5 times now and I still wee each time haha x

I live on Hampstead High Street, so see you round most days. Watching AfterLife has made me realise, you can never underestimate the humanity in a person you pass on the street. I'm blown away with your talent at capturing subtle and important human relationships.

My Mrs admitted she’s never really liked you. Under duress, just finished watching Afterlife it made her laugh and cry, and cry and laugh! She loved it. I’ve suggested watching Humanity on weekend. She’s gonna fucking hate you again!
So after watching AfterLife , I've decided to watch all of stuff on . Currently watching Humanity ... What a way to turn a boring Sunday into a pretty good one! RickyGervais
Brilliant show Ricky. You do have a way with showing humanity , even though you like dogs better! Loved the series.
Absolutely beautiful and brilliant so glad you reminded humanity how equal and so important dogs are
"If you can laugh in the face of adversity, you're bullet-proof." - Funny af. But boy it surely hits home. Humanity
“Let her host. Just don’t let her drive” after AfterLife I’ve had to go back to Humanity . Can’t wait for Supernatural I can get tickets

Don’t normally do Twitter - but on off chance you read this, I wanted to say After Life is magnificent - deeply moving and a much needed dose of humanity in an increasingly inhumane world. And funny as fuck. Well, well done.
Why is the world obsessing over Ricky Gervais , who is only marginally less of a stain on humanity than Richard Dawkins.
Fuck me. Binged AfterLife and not only did I really need it, it restored my faith in sarcasm, dark comedy and humanity at its best! Thank you for the belly laughs and tears.
A profound philosophical essay about humanity ...
Had a very -y weekend. AfterLife then TheOffice now Humanity been on a rollercoaster of emotions! Netflix
How the hell have I always thought Karl Pilkington was the funny one until I saw Humanity and now Afterlife...hes just genius!
So much humanity in each character, Truly awesome show.
Spent a recovery Sunday watching afterlife which was fantastic viewing and humanity stand up brutal comedy which was even better... both deffo worth a watch...
Have you watched his humanity tour? The mans a god
Absolutely brilliant, Mate. Cheers! AfterLife Thank you Humanity
is that you? humanity
After watching AfterLife I’ve just rewatched Humanity and it’s actually funnier second time around Great way to pass the morning on maternity leave Legend comedy babyissleeping
The trajectory you have taken your craft is truly a fresh look at humanity . It’s easy to see the horrid but the decent takes a look. Thanks for looking and showing what you’ve found!

AfterLife awed by your work. You get it. You put a mirror on the best of humanity , the absurdity and fragility, joy and pain... dementia, sad single office girls, loss, grief, marital breakdowns, bullies, love and friendship...and dogs. You are genius. Thank you
Constantly binge watching Ricky Gervais humanity and Afterlife absolutely in tears both laughing and crying
2 episodes in. We went to see him twice on the humanity tour if you get the opportunity to see him live. Take it. He's fucking hilarious.

Just finished After Life and as usual brilliant,I started episode 4 and couldn't stop its now 4am. You really are an amazing person and really get humanity , Thank you for making the world a better place with your humour and sarcasm. Plus your love of animals bonus.
Good job on After Life, it made me laugh and it made me cry, it also restored my faith in humanity , (except for the arseholes)
lovely lovely lovely. Thank you for spreading the love and the humanity .
After watching AfterLife I am now onto watching Humanity for the 5th time. Can’t get enough of the genius
omg don't! i was there too?! humanity tour yeh? i completely agree one of the best moments of my bloody life
Humanity was brilliant. I was struggling for air. I'm glad it ended. Otherwise I would have suffocated. Afterlife was interesting. I enjoyed the perspective.
by far the best program I've watched all year. Poignant and funny. A work of art. Almost restores my faith in humanity !

You are a true auteur of kindness, gratitude and humility. Those strengths bring every one of your main characters to the climax of their journey. As a teacher I am truly grateful that you use TV to inspire audiences with such humanity and love. Bravo for AfterLife
It's beautiful Ricky. And we researched Humanity to top it off. A rewatch of Derek coming soon.
I see him live when he done his ‘ Humanity ’ stand up. I was in stitches!
humanity is a plague.
What a sickenning specimen of humanity this man is. Wonder if it's the only way he can get an errection?
just watching humanity again but it's the 1st time our cat has watched it.
I am so depressed because I can’t see how you can top this. But wait...dog tells me you will! You bring us joy Ricky, and philosophy and humanity . Thank you.

Ricky is one of the great comic minds of our time. If his new show is anything as good as his stand up special Humanity , which had me in stitches, it will be special. Plus it has an awesome dog in it, can't go wrong!
Huge fan of , but even more so after watching all of AfterLife on back to back. Funny but with so much heart and Humanity ! Highly recommend it.

Friends - I really recommend afterlife on netflix starring rickygervais . As someone who survived the first year after losing a spouse to cancer I was a bit wary but this story is told in a way that celebrates humanity in all the right ways.
Ps meant the human race not your show ‘ humanity ’

Mate this must be one of the best series I’ve ever seen. I hope it will raise enough awareness about depression and the condition that makes humanity struggle at this point in time. Thank you for doing this work Afterlife
seen all, without stopping, the first season ... wonderful !! congratulations Ricky Gervais !! Again you put in people, which is more precious: humanity !!

Hope in one hand and shit in the other and tell me which one fills up fastest. Hope is nice and sweet. I therefore hope that a sequel to Humanity is in the making because I prefer to have a mouth spewing laughs to a hand full of shit! Humanity2 2Handsfull bustagutlaughing H2

Started AfterLife on Netflix this morning and finished it just now. Pure excellence from start to finish. Beautifully written and brilliantly performed; depth without pretension. Hilarious, moving, wise and overflowing with humanity . We are lucky to have Ricky.
Last month rewatched The Office. Watched Humanity , rewatched Extras last week, watched After Life this week. Next: Derek rewatch.

Liked the afterlife , best reality since the Osbournes. Didn’t know you have a day job, but well UK is not exactly a Hollywood. Based on Humanity expected the house in Hammersmith be bit more posh, loved the dog thou.
He’s hilarious... watch humanity as well. I was crying
Smh is right, humanity is a plague.
Laugh-sobbing at a snow globe of Kevin Hart. is a certifiable genius of comedy and humanity . AfterLife
A beautifully observed and honest handling of sensitive subject matter. Through Tony personifies humanity ’s complexity, with all it’s lumps and bumps.
Vote 1 Ricky, for pope of the Catholic church. Then rename the church to The Art of Humanity . Then rename the bible to The First Fairy Tales.
I’m so glad you put the bit about god’s into humanity as it saves me from explaining it to everyone I know.
netflix is launching a quiet secret war against humanity --they've given both Adam Sandler & Ricky Gervais several shows, and have produced roughly 4 satanist themed teen programs
I really enjoyed your “ Humanity ”. It’s nice to know that I’m not alone with my way of thinking. Also with you on the animal cruelty issues. Stay strong...
I thought it was superb. seems to be capturing and then reflecting the full spectrum of elements of modern humanity . And all done with trademark acidic sarcasm.
It is brilliant Ricky, sad, funny, honest and reminding us of our humanity . I hope it continues to receive the praise it is due.
Ricky Gervais just getting better by every year, so sad they are showing American “The Office” in Norway . If haven’t seen Humanity , u will have a treat
I saw " Humanity " on Netflix, i need to tell: you have my respect, thank you! m(_ _)m

VERY clever! Just sayin to a pal what an incredible depiction it is of grief & just raw, honest humanity . The fact that humour & pain are so interlinked has seldom been better illustrated. Fuckin awesome! I'm missin all the Afterlife characters like you do after a good book
Interviewer : Now you're rich and famous, I bet you don't know how much a pint of milk is? Ricky : Dunno here's a grand go get me a pint Genius Humanity
humanity superb. That is all.

I'm not normally a big fan - aside from the podcasts and "A Guide to..." but after the Humanity stand-up my views changed and AfterLife blew me away. It's apt Tony got that hammer as he hit countless nails on the head. Thank you, sir. Utter genius.
AfterLife has destroyed me. What a stunning and refreshing slice of humanity . Thank you.
Have a wee change, afterlife will make you believe in humanity again...
The hilarious never fails to make me laugh until my belly hurts. Bloody genius. Humanity Netflix itsthecontextofthejokefolks
is a gift to humanity
Another outstanding work from Mr Gervais. He does humanity so well and I too laughed and cried and wished it could go on forever. Television at its best (and congrats to your best mate too)

Watching afterlife and it's nice to know I'm not the only one who despises humanity , longingly waits for the inevitable extinction of the human race and acts like an arsehole in the meantime. Cheers, . You've outdone yourself.
Humanity , excellent !

AfterLife Wow! Take a bow it's a cracker. Great cast, very funny, very moving and thought provoking. Tears of joy and sadness. "you're my boy" fucking finished me. Think I'll have to watch Derek now. Not sure the wife is ready for Humanity yet though.
I watched both After Life and Humanity this week, thank you brilliant work !

"After Life" on NetFlix. Poetically engaging and thoughtful portrayal of the hideous beauty of life. Thank you , for the wonderful reminder of our responsibility to fully live our lives and find our own joy in the messy world of humanity .
Amazing! Just started watching After Life and loving it so far . Watched humanity again tonight and once again cried laughing! Hilarious

Tweeted before when I had just started. Now I'm so sad I've finished. Terrific characters and such a funny, touching and spot-on look at depression, humanity and hope. Laughed and cried. Thank you so much for this, !
Just finished it too After Life ...... an inspired window on our world ....... loved its honesty and humanity .....great script.
Loved its warmth, it’s painful sadness, it’s joy and it’s humanity ....beautifully shot too. Top performances, especially Roisin Conaty.

. Thank you. Thank you for understanding humanity and creating something that has to be one of the most truthful things I’ve ever had the privilege to watch. AfterLife is fucking amazing and you are truly and beautifully brilliant.
watched the after life an it was amazing as usual but i thought it was quite sad and funny... im now watching humanity hilarious........
I know your After life poster wasn't airbrushed.. there the same beatdown jeans you wore for the Humanity tour

Oh Ricky, what an absolute work of genius AfterLife is. Rarely have I laughed and sobbed so much in the space of every half hour piece. Fantastic cast, wonderful script and such a poignant observation of humanity . Hats off to you sir x themansagenius
Absolutely brilliant. Had me laughing and crying in equal measures. The world's in desperate need of humanity and you've reminded us about the important things in life.
Wonderful program. Humanity . Friendship. Despair. Hope and love. Just brilliant. Congratulations.

Australia has only just got it today...I’m only 15 min into it! Thank you absolutely hysterical..as always! loved your “ Humanity ” & so excited to see this! Love your humour! Thank you for loving animals
I am literally roaring watching ’ Humanity tour. whyidonthavechildren
Just watched stand up humanity ... Oh my ribs hurt and face aches!!
I was watching Humanity again and my wife heard it from the other room. She comes out and says "I had no idea Jamie Oliver was so funny!"
Actually decided I hate humanity as much as Ricky gervais
is the funniest man alive his stand up humanity is funny aswell and also on Netflix
I so agree it is pognant and shows grieving but has a lovely ending. There is hope for humanity !!

Watched "After Life" and loved it! and now rewatching " Humanity " and also loving that! I know some trans agenda people attacked you for it but it's brilliant and I hope you can stick to your guns despite the rancor from that crowd.

I thought it was really self indulgent. If there was a bit more humility that Tony was actually just a selfish prick and not this good man in pain I could have bought it more. The only time I got a sense of humanity is when his brother in law tells him
Oh, the humanity ! AfterLife is a masterpiece for many reasons but mostly for reminding us that humans really NEED dogs. you are most extraordinary.
2 Dictatorships don't give a shit about humanity , let alone precious lives like these! LivingHell
Albeit it sad, I enjoyed afterlife so much that I decided to watch in Humanity for the 3rd time x hilarious
just when u think "u should of left it" after Humanity u follow it up with Afterlife. Genius.
what an amazing cast and fabulous script. If this was a film it would cleanup at awards season. Afterlife was all my favourite bits of humanity played out on the small screen. Perfection
In the last three days, I’ve watched The Office (UK), David Brent: Life on the Road, and After Life. Watched Humanity when it came out. Is there anything you’e contributed to that’s not good?

Binged AfterLife today. I really relate to how you portrayed Tony. That character is basically me, The show won't probably change my viewpoint of humanity , but it did gave me a different perspective towards my inner circle. I'm sure they'll thank you for it :D
I was probably the last person in the world to watch Humanity , but thank fuck I finally did..comedy at its best! And surely my swearing is acceptable due to the subject
Every review is ‘he is an asshole and narcissist’ then ends with “For the first time since The Office, he has made a show with humanity and heart.”

listened only two weeks ago to a past Desert Island Discs. Lilywhite. Beautiful. Jimmy Webb my joy. Loved your story, Loved The Office, Extras and Derek. Love your stand up. And now After Life. Love your humanity and humour RG. You finished with Lilywhite,
Loved Humanity and loving AfterLife !! Come and do stand up in my local pub and I’ll donate £500 to an animal charity and i’ll pay for beers?!?!

Pls call NJ Murphy 609-292-6000 & tell him 2 keep his promise 2 stop NJ bear hunt. Hunters throw firecrackers in dens scare mom&cubs out then shoot TheOffice Extras Derek Humanity AfterLife SuperNature

Just when you think can’t do any better, he makes afterlife Watched all 6 episodes and it’s probably the best 3 TV hours I’ve ever seen. His ability to deliver humour against a background of sadness is extraordinary. humanity dogsrule
Do U mean Derek ? Loved that series. Have you Humanity just brilliant he makes more sense in talking for five minutes than Teresa May has talked in years.
Humanity OMG stop... in stitches!

It’s very interesting how suicide is approached in this series. It appears as not a cry for help but as a part of life no different then death. You get a lot of Ricky stand up style too which is subtle but if you’ve followed him through his career you get his take on humanity
Finished this last night! Honestly fantastic, followed by rewatching humanity to! Loved it!
try as I might, I couldn't get on with Humanity . However, two episodes in and After Life is quite simply a work of genius. Thank you for a journey through the emotions
basically,,, the homophobia in my dad JUMPED out. we watched that ricky gervais humanity comedy show a while back that is funny & offensive in so many ways
This just renewed my faith in humanity . AfterLife
Ricky you should take immense pride in this piece of work and how it's pulled people together through empathy and pure humanity . So heartwarming and Tim we're all behind you fella
afterlife Sad, moving, funny. Full of humanity
Is AfterLife supposed to be a comedy? It’s so dreary and dull. Looks like has jumped the shark with this one (although I do agree that humanity ’s a plague). wasteofrime

Best AfterLife scene so far: on the car after being offended by the joke of suicide. The brother in law speech is exactly in Humanity . Stop being offended u fucking selfish! Great lesson by the greatest guy!
Watching Ricky Gervais ’s Humanity on my last night of “work” was an excellent way to lead into my retirement. Absolutely brilliant!

=genius. Just watched 1st season of series “After Life” in one sitting. Every layer of the onion (dare you not to cry) in half-hr episodes: drama, hilarity, tenderness, desolation, hope, humanity . Exceptional writing, acting, editing. Pls make more!
That’s the real reason it was called Humanity - it was the closest to HugeManatee they could get...

Wonderful Afterlife demonstrates the importance of humour in our evolution. It resonated so deeply & subversively took us all on the very journey it portrays. Tv therapy for the soul. Humanity imprinted in perfect detail onto every frame. Bravo & cast & Thankyou
Ah i didn't know Humanity was now on Netflix. Saw you in this at Plymouth Pavilions in Devon Will watch it again on tv then thanks. Yed well done innit ps I've stopped crying over Afterlife now
Really? I love everything he does,seen him live in Oxford when he did he stand up your Humanity proper funny mate. Can’t wait to go to him on his next tour. The office is the best tv show tho for me.

I watched After Life in one sitting, just had to. And now watched Ricky Gervais ’ Humanity twice in two days, so now I feel I’ve overdosed on Ricky. Might have to go and lie down for the next few days, well worth it though.
just finished watching AfterLife What a beautiful reflection of humanity . Brilliantly cast. Amazing writing and wonderfully told. Some of the best I’ve seen in a very long time.
